Interface PreferencesBusinessInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
PreferencesBusiness
public interface PreferencesBusinessInterface
Defines the behavior that a generic preferences model should expose to the application controller. This interface provides methods for managing user preferences and application settings such as language.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<String>
    getCurrentLanguage()
    Retrieves the current language setting of the application.
    Optional<Object>
    getPreference(String key)
    Retrieves the value of a specific preference associated with the provided key.
    void
    setCurrentLanguage(String language)
    Sets the current language of the application and persists the change.
    void
    setPreference(Map.Entry<String,String> preference)
    Stores a preference represented as a key-value pair and persists the change.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentLanguage

      Optional<String> getCurrentLanguage()
      Retrieves the current language setting of the application.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the current language code (e.g., "en-US", "it-Ch"), or empty if no language is set

    • getPreference

      Optional<Object> getPreference(String key)
      Retrieves the value of a specific preference associated with the provided key.
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the preference to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the value of the preference, or empty if the key does not exist

    • setCurrentLanguage

      void setCurrentLanguage(String language) throws IOException
      Sets the current language of the application and persists the change.
      Parameters:
      language - the language code to set (e.g., "en-US", "it-CH")
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving the language preference

    • setPreference

      void setPreference(Map.Entry<String,String> preference) throws IOException
      Stores a preference represented as a key-value pair and persists the change.
      Parameters:
      preference - a Map.Entry containing the key and value of the preference to store
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while saving the preference
